levels.description: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, Block <@ba.vup>+{block_cnt}</>; While this skill is active, this unit only takes <@ba.vup>{damage_resistance:0%}</> of incoming damage, with the remaining amount dealt as HP loss over <@ba.vup>{final_duration}</> seconds after this skill ends
